topics.body:
Back from magfest

Saw virt perform live
Double dragon neon and shovel knight remix
It was amaze

Saw Liam senpai on the arcade floor
Didn't want to bother him since he was in the middle of a game so I just said hi

Saw the Avgn movie. I was tired as shit and it was way too long but otherwise it was an Avgn movie. Nothing more nothing less

Got pizza from a place called pizza italia
It was goddamn delicious

 Went to the sleepy cabin panel. 
Had stamper and oney sign a plastic turd for me and my friend

Went to the normal boots panel
Watch it as soon as it's on YouTube because it's fucking hilarious

Had hot peppers on a sandwich the night before I left
Bad idea
Very bad idea

Went to a weird dollar store on the way home and found a gundam knockoff that looks like blue cheese, an old fmv adventure game starring Tim curry, a minimalist pig toy and a playstation 2 jam pack demo disk

Have pictures from other stuff
Will show later
Too tired now
